SELECT * FROM( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, b.* from portfolio_board b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp
where bod_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where bod_CONTENT like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where bod_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR bod_CONTENT like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY bod_NO desc ) AS boardlist
where rownum > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum <= #{pageNum}*#{amount}

SELECT count(*) FROM portfolio_board
where bod_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where bod_CONTENT like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where bod_TITLE like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR bod_CONTENT like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
